type.description:
## Sprinting

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/sprinting)

Checks whether the entity is currently sprinting.

Type ID: `origins:sprinting`



---

### üìù Note

__This entity condition type will only work on players.__






---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:sprinting"
}
```
